title: Happy Birthday, Ayumu-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Happy birthday, Ayumu-chan~! Kanata will make the most delicious cake for you today, so look forward to it, okay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Thank you so much, Kanata-san. Umm.... Can I help make the cake?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I’m really happy that everyone is celebrating for me, but I also want to give something back to everyone.... That’s why I want to help you make the cake!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ayumu-chan.... You’re such a good girl! There, there, you just turned on my onee-chan switch~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ehehe, that feels nice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Then, let’s make a special cake together today♪ Let’s see, can you remove the stem from the strawberries?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Okay! ....It’s done!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>So faaast! Alright, Ayumu-chan, open wide♪ Here’s a taste only for you for being so helpful~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Aaaaan~.... Hnn~, it’s so sweet and delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
